dialogue: Oh, is that you, Elphaba?
Hope I didn't startle you-- it's so hard to make out people's faces when I'm back there!
It's so good to meet you, Elphaba.
Well, what have we here?
For you. My special guest.
Thank you, your Ozness.
And this is--?
It's gr een.
Well- it doesn't have to be.
Is that-- your heart's desire?
No. My heart's desire is for you to help the Animals.
I thought you might say that. It's the darndest thing, it's almost like-- I already know you.
Oh, your Ozness-- I knew you'd understand! That makes me so happy.
Well, that's what I love best. Making people happy.
Madame Morrible!
No. Let me prove myself... Please. At least, let me try!
It opens itself to her.
So. Which spell will you start with?
You're right. That's a harsh word. How about... scouts? They'll fly around Oz-- and report back any seditious Animal activity!
Seditious Animal activity? What are you...?
Elphaba... when I first got here, there was discord and discontent-- and back where I come from, everyone knows the best way to bring folks together is-- give them a really good enemy.
But-- if you wanted spies... why not just make them yourself?
Read it. Cast a spell.
